item.title: Dead trees, 24th June
item.description:
I live opposite these trees I'm told that the ground is not owned by the people that live there my concern is that there are quite a few dead trees which would fall on the road. I live at no 35 the trees are in front of 34

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Church Road, Tewkesbury

item.title: Dead tree within dense vegetation., 24th June
item.description:
To the right of the entrance to Little Priors, opposite 35, Station Road. Dense vegetation right up to roadside. Dead tree or possibly trees within it. Potential hazard to passing road users, pedestrians and houses opposite.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 25, Station Road, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Damaged traffic light .car crash uprooted traffic light @junction A38/treddington road/odessa pub. 22/06/24., 24th June
item.description:
Car,went through red traffic light on A38 crossroads @Odessa pub/treddington road, uprooted the traffic light on t(is very fast and dangerous junction. Police were called .
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Stoke Road, Stoke Orchard, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: The traffic light has been vandalised
